    {"s":"PET scan", "p":"uses", "o":"internal sources", "modalities":["text"], "confidence":1.0, "evidence":"In CT, the radiation source is external — the X-ray tube outside the patient. In nuclear imaging, the source is internal — a radioactive tracer introduced into the bloodstream."},

evidence: In CT, the radiation source is external - the X-ray tube outside the patient. In nuclear imaging, the source is internal - a radioactive tracer introduced into the bloodstream.
